select u.user_no userNo, p.prod_no prodNo, u.name name, p.prodname prodname, t.theatername theatername, h.hallname hallname, to_char(r.viewdate, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') viewdate, r.rez_no rezNo, to_char(r.rezdate, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') rezdate
from reserve r, users u, product p, theater t, hall h where r.user_no= u.user_no and p.prod_no= r.prod_no and p.hall_no= h.hall_no and t.theater_no= h.theater_no and r.rez_no= #{rezNo} and u.user_no= #{userNo}

select selseat_no, rez_no, dc_no, grade, section, col, num, payment, status, to_char(pretime, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') pretime
from selseat where rez_no = #{rezNo}
